references.paper_title: Adaptive model design for Markov decision process
references.reason: This paper introduces a closely related algorithm for model design in MDPs, which the current paper extends to contextual settings and improves upon.
This paper introduces contextual stochastic bilevel optimization, a framework that the current work builds upon to develop a bilevel reinforcement learning model.

references.paper_title: Lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization, which are used to contextualize the convergence guarantees of the proposed algorithm.
This paper introduces multilevel Monte Carlo methods, which are leveraged to improve the efficiency of the hypergradient estimation in the proposed algorithm.

references.paper_title: On the global convergence rates of softmax policy gradient methods
references.reason: This paper analyzes the convergence rates of softmax policy gradient methods, which are relevant to understanding the convergence behavior of the lower-level optimization in the proposed framework.
